name: Explosive Steampunk Pinball
description:
In Explosive Steampunk Pinball, the bumpers can be blown up. When the ball hits the bumper, they will spin faster and faster until... BOOM! You can expedite this process by enhancing your ball in the forge. Though, you may only enter after powering the door from the clock tower. The steam gauge in the center reflects the total heat all of the gears have generated.

Explosive Steampunk Pinball is my entry for the GamesPlusJam 3 Game Jam. The theme for this game was created using a generator. My them was "Steampunk Explosive Pinball".

Music: Steamtown

From: https://soundtrackuniverse.com

Known Issues:

- The ball can clip out of the machine

- There are a few spots the ball can get stuck

- The left paddles love to spin

- The plunger doesn't apply force to the ball consistently

- The ball can sneak into the forge from above

*Super secret dev hack: Press e to teleport into the forge*
